paragraphs.original: 却说贾母坐起说道：“我到你们家已经六十多年了，从年轻的时候到老来，福也享尽了。自你们老爷起，儿子孙子也都算是好的了。就是宝玉呢，我疼了他一场－－”说到那里，拿眼满地下瞅著。王夫人便推宝玉走到床前。贾母从被窝里伸出手来拉著宝玉，道：“我的儿，你要争气才好！”
paragraphs.english: 贾母坐起来说：“我在你们家已经六十多年了，从年轻到现在，享尽了福气。你们老爷儿子孙子也都算不错。就是宝玉呢，我疼了他一场－－”说到那里，她拿眼满地下瞅著。王夫人就推宝玉走到床前。贾母从被窝里伸出手来拉著宝玉，道：“我的儿，你要争气才好！”
paragraphs.chinese: 话说贾母坐起来说：“我在你们家已经六十多年了，从年轻到现在，享尽了福气。你们老爷儿子孙子也都算不错。就是宝玉呢，我疼了他一场－－”说到那里，她拿眼满地下瞅著。王夫人就推宝玉走到床前。贾母从被窝里伸出手来拉著宝玉，道：“我的儿，你要争气才好！”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉嘴里答应，心里一酸，那眼泪便要流下来，又不敢哭，只得站著。听贾母说道：“我想再见一个重孙子，我就安心了。我的兰儿在那里呢？”李纨也推贾兰上去。贾母放了宝玉，拉著贾兰，道：“你母亲是要孝顺的。将来你成了人，也叫你母亲风光风光！－－凤丫头呢？”
paragraphs.english: Bao Yuyue answered, his heart ached, his tears almost fell, but he dared not cry, so he stood there. Grandmother Jia said, "I want to see another great-grandson before I can rest in peace. Where is my Lan?" Li Wan also pushed Jia Lan up. Grandmother Jia let go of Bao Yuyue and took hold of Jia Lan, saying, "You must be filial. When you become a man in the future, you must make your mother shine and shine!" - Where is Feng Yaotiao?
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉答应了一声，心里酸酸的，眼泪快要流下来了，但又不敢哭，只好站着。贾母说：“我想再看到一个重孙子，我才能安心。我的兰儿在哪里？”李纨也推着贾兰上去。贾母松开宝玉，拉住贾兰，说：“你要孝顺。将来你成了人，也要让你母亲风光风光！－－凤丫头呢？”

paragraphs.original: 凤姐本来站在贾母旁边，赶忙走到跟前，说：“在这里呢。”贾母道：“我的儿，你是太聪明了，将来修修福罢！我也没有修什么，不过心实吃亏。那些吃斋念佛的事我也不大干，就是旧年叫人写了些《金刚经》送送人，不知送完了没有？”凤姐道：“没有呢。”贾母道：“早该施舍完了才好。我们大老爷和珍儿是在外头乐了；最可恶的是史丫头没良心，怎么总不来瞧我！”鸳鸯等明知其故，都不言语。
paragraphs.english: Feng Ji stood beside Jia Mother and quickly walked to her side, saying, "Here we are." Jia Mother said, "My son, you are too smart. You will accumulate more blessings in the future. I haven't done much to improve myself, but I have been exploited. Last year, I had someone write some "Diamond Sutra" to give to others, but I don't know if it's been finished yet." Feng Ji said, "Not yet finished." Jia Mother said, "It's time to finish it. Our big brother and Juen are out playing. The most annoying thing is that Shi Erniang is ungrateful and never comes to see me!" Quan Yang knew the reason and didn't say anything.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐站在贾母旁边，赶忙走到贾母面前，说：“在这里呢。”贾母道：“我的儿，你太聪明了，将来要多积些福气。我也没怎么修，只是心实吃亏。去年叫人写了些《金刚经》送给别人，不知道送完了没有？”凤姐道：“没有送完。”贾母道：“早该送完了才好。我们大老爷和珍儿在外面玩乐；最可恨的是史丫头没良心，怎么总不来瞧我！”鸳鸯等知道原因，都不说话。

paragraphs.original: 贾母又瞧了一瞧宝钗，叹了口气，只见脸上发红。贾政知是回光返照，即忙进上参汤。贾母的牙关已经紧了，合了一回眼，又睁著满屋里瞧了一瞧。王夫人宝钗上去，轻轻扶著，邢夫人凤姐等便忙穿衣。地下婆子们已将床安设停当，铺了被褥。听见贾母喉间略一响动，脸变笑容，竟是去了。享年八十三岁。众婆子疾忙停床。
paragraphs.english: Jia Mother looked at Baochai again and sighed. Baochai's face turned red. Jia Zheng knew this was a last gasp, so he quickly handed her a cup of ginseng soup. Jia Mother's jaw was tight, and she closed her eyes. Then she opened them again and looked around the room. Wang Fei and Baochai supported her, while Xingfei, Fengjie, and others hurried to dress. The maids quickly set up the bed and spread the quilts. Jia Mother made a sound in her throat, smiled, and passed away. She was 83 years old. The maids quickly stopped the bed.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母又看了看宝钗，叹了口气，只见脸上发红。贾政知道这是回光返照，于是赶紧端上参汤。贾母的牙关已经紧了，合上眼睛，又睁开了，满屋里瞧了一瞧。王夫人和宝钗扶著她，邢夫人、凤姐等人赶紧穿上衣服。地下婆子们已经将床安设好，铺好了被褥。听见贾母喉间发出一声响动，脸上露出笑容，她走了。享年八十三岁。众婆子迅速停床。

paragraphs.original: 于是贾政等在外一边跪著，邢夫人等在内一边跪著，一齐举起哀来。外面家人各样预备齐全，只听里头信儿一传出来，从荣府大门起至内宅门，扇扇大开，一色净白纸糊了；孝棚高起，大门前的牌楼立时竖起；上下人等登时成服。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng and his family members knelt outside, while Xing Fu and her family members knelt inside. Everyone raised their voices in mourning. The outside staff had everything prepared. As soon as the news arrived, the gates from the Yongfu Mansion to the inner courtyard were opened one by one, and all the doors were covered with white paper. The mourning tent was set up, and the gate's arch was erected. The servants and family members dressed in mourning clothes immediately.
paragraphs.chinese:
贾政等人跪在外面，邢夫人等人跪在里面，大家一齐哭起来。外面家人们把一切准备好，只要一有消息，从荣府大门到内宅门，扇扇大门都打开，全用白纸糊了；孝棚建好，大门前的牌楼也竖起来；上下人等马上穿上丧服。

Here is a simple translation of the given Chinese text into English:

Outside, Jia Zheng and his family members knelt down, while inside, Xing Fu and her family members also knelt down. They all raised their voices in mourning. The outside staff had everything prepared. As soon as the news arrived, the gates from the Yongfu Mansion to the inner courtyard were opened one by one, and all the doors were covered with white paper. The mourning tent was set up, and the gate's arch was erected. The servants and family members dressed in mourning clothes immediately.

paragraphs.original: 贾政报了丁忧，礼部奏闻。主上深仁厚泽：念及世代功勋，又系元妃祖母，赏银一千两，谕礼部主祭。家人们各处报丧。众亲友虽知贾家势败，今见圣恩隆重，都来探丧。择了吉时成殓，停灵正寝。
paragraphs.english:
Jia Zheng reported his bereavement to the Ministry of Rites, and the emperor was benevolent and awarded him 1,000 taels of silver for the main sacrifice. The servants went around to notify everyone of the news. Although the friends and relatives knew that the Jia family had fallen on hard times, they came to offer condolences because of the emperor's great kindness. They chose a good time to embalm the body and placed it in the main chamber.

英文翻译：

Jia Zheng reported his bereavement to the Ministry of Rites, and the emperor was benevolent and awarded him 1,000 taels of silver for the main sacrifice. The servants went around to notify everyone of the news. Although the friends and relatives knew that the Jia family had fallen on hard times, they came to offer condolences because of the emperor's great kindness. They chose a good time to embalm the body and placed it in the main chamber.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政因丁忧报礼部，主上仁厚，赏银一千两，令礼部主祭。家人们到处报丧。众亲友虽知贾家势败，见圣恩隆重，都来探丧。择吉时成殓，停灵正寝。

paragraphs.original: 贾赦不在家，贾政为长；宝玉、贾环、贾兰是亲孙，年纪又小，都应守灵。贾琏虽也是亲孙，带著贾蓉，尚可分派家人办事。虽请了些男女外亲来照应，内里邢王二夫人、李纨、凤姐、宝钗等是应灵旁哭泣的。尤氏虽可照应，他自贾珍外出，依住荣府，一向总不上前，且又荣府的事不甚谙练。贾蓉的媳妇更不必说。惜春年小，虽在这里长的，他于家事全不知道。－－所以内里竟无一人支持。只有凤姐可以照管里头的事，况又贾琏在外作主，里外他二人，倒也相宜。
paragraphs.english: Jia Pai was not at home, Jia Zheng was the eldest grandson, Baoyu, Jiahuan and Jialan were his close grandchildren, they were young, they should all guard the tomb. Jialing was Jia Zheng's close grandson, and Jia Rong, he could still distribute the attendants to do things. Although he had invited some male and female relatives to attend to it, inside, the two ladies, Xing, Wang, Liwan, Feng, Baoshan and so on, are the ones who should weep by the tomb. Youshi could take care of it, but he has been staying at the Rong府 since Jia Zhen went out, and he has never gone forward, and he is not familiar with the affairs inside. Jia Rong's wife is not worth mentioning. Xici is young, although he has grown up here, he knows nothing about the family affairs. So there was no one inside to support. Only Feng can take care of the inside things. And Jialing is in charge outside, so they are a good match.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾赦不在家，贾政是长孙，宝玉、贾环、贾兰是他的亲孙，年龄小，都应当守灵。贾琏虽然是贾政的亲孙，带著贾蓉，尚可分派家人办事。虽然请了些男女外亲来照应，内里邢王二夫人、李纨、凤姐、宝钗等是应灵旁哭泣的。尤氏虽可照应，他自贾珍外出，依住荣府，一向总不上前，且又荣府的事不甚谙练。贾蓉的媳妇更不必说。惜春年小，虽在这里长的，他于家事全不知道。－－所以内里竟无一人支持。只有凤姐可以照管里头的事，况又贾琏在外作主，里外他二人，倒也相宜。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐先前仗著自己的才干，原打量老太太死了，他大有一番作用。邢王二夫人等本知他曾办过秦氏的事，必是妥当，于是仍叫凤姐总理里头的事。凤姐本不应辞，自然应了，心想：“这里的事本是我管的。那些家人更是我手下的人。太太和珍大嫂子的人本来难使唤，如今他们都去了。银项虽没有对牌，这宗银子却是现成的。外头的事又是我们那个办。虽说我现今身子不好，想来也不致落褒贬，必比宁府里还得办些。”心下已定，且待明日接了三，后日一早分派。便叫周瑞家的传出话去，将“花名册”取上来。
paragraphs.english: As for the management of the household, the Shanshan wife had planned to let Wang Xifeng be in charge after her mother’s death. The Shanshan wife and the Wang wife both knew that Wang Xifeng had handled the affairs of the deceased Lady Qin and that she must have done it well, so they still asked Wang Xifeng to be in charge of the household affairs. Wang Xifeng did not want to refuse, so she agreed. She thought to herself, “The household affairs have always been my responsibility. Those servants are also my subordinates. The people of the Shanshan and Wang families are hard to deal with, but now they have all left. The silver jewelry without the label is ready. The outside affairs are also handled by us. Although my health is not good now, I believe I can do a better job than the Ning family.” She made up her mind and planned to divide the work tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. She then ordered Zhou Ruiji to pass on the message to collect the “list of names”.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐以前仗着自己的才能，原打算等老太太死后，他大有一番作为。邢王二夫人等本知他曾经处理过秦氏的事，必是妥当，于是仍叫凤姐总理里头的事。凤姐本不应辞，自然应了，心想：“这里的事本来是我管的。那些家人更是我手下的人。太太和珍大嫂子的人本来难使唤，如今他们都去了。银项虽没有对牌，这宗银子却是现成的。外头的事又是我们那个办。虽说我现今身子不好，想来也不致落褒贬，必比宁府里还得办些。”心下已定，且待明日接了三，后日一早分派。便叫周瑞家的传出话去，将“花名册”取上来。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐一一的瞧了，统共男仆只有二十一人，女仆只有十九人，馀者俱是些丫头，连各房算上，也不过三十多人，难以派差。心里想道：“这回老太太的事倒没有东府里的人多。”又将庄上的弄出几个，也不敷差遣。正在思算，只见一个小丫头过来说：“鸳鸯姐姐请奶奶。”凤姐只得过去。只见鸳鸯哭得泪人一般，一把拉著凤姐儿，说道：“二奶奶请坐，我给二奶奶磕个头。虽说服中不行礼，这个头是要磕的！”鸳鸯说著跪下，慌的凤姐赶忙拉住，说道：“这是什么礼？有话好好的说！”鸳鸯跪著，凤姐便拉起来。鸳鸯说道：“老太太的事，一应内外，都是二爷和二奶奶办。这宗银子是老太太留下的。老太太这一辈子也没有糟蹋过什么银钱，如今临了这件大事，必得求二奶奶体体面面的办一办才好！我方才听见老爷说什么‘诗云子曰’，我也不懂；又说什么‘丧与其易，宁戚’，我更不明白。我问宝二奶奶，说是老爷的意思：老太太的丧事，只要悲切才是真孝，不必糜费，图好看的念头。我想老太太这样一个人，怎么不该体面些？我虽是奴才丫头，敢说什么？只是老太太疼二奶奶和我这一场，临死了还不叫他风光风光？我想二奶奶是能办大事的，故此，我请二奶奶来，求作个主意！我生是跟老太太的人，老太太死了，我也是跟老太太的！若是瞧不见老太太的事怎么办，将来怎么见老太太呢？”
paragraphs.english: Fengji looked at them one by one and found that there were only twenty-one male servants and nineteen female servants. The rest were maids. Adding up the people from the various rooms, there were only thirty or so, not enough for the job. Fengji thought to herself, "This time, there are not as many people from the East Garden as there are from the West." She then brought in some people from the farm, but it was still not enough. Just as she was thinking about what to do, a little servant girl came over and said, "Please come to see the young lady, Xuan Yang." Fengji had to go. She saw Xuan Yang crying, her face a mess. She grabbed Fengji's hand and said, "Please sit down, Madame Fengji. I am going to pay my respects to you. Even though it is not the right time for a formal bow, I must still pay my respects!" Xuan Yang knelt down, and Fengji hurriedly pulled her up, saying, "What is this for? Just talk to me normally!" Xuan Yang knelt, and Fengji pulled her up. Xuan Yang said, "Everything concerning the late mistress' funeral will be handled by my husbandI asked the second lady, the master's intention was that the funeral of the old lady should only be true filial piety if it was mournful, and not to spend too much, just to look good. I think that such a person as the old lady, how should not be decent? Although I am a servant maid, but dare to say something? Just the old lady loved the second lady and me, why not let her have a good time before she died? I think the second lady is a person who can do great things, so I ask the second lady to come, to ask for an idea! I am born to be a person of the old lady, the old lady died, I am also with the old lady! How to do if not to do the old lady's business, how to see the old lady in the future?
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐一一地看了看，发现男仆只有二十一人，女仆只有十九人，剩下的都是些丫鬟，加上各个房间的人，总共只有三十多人，不够派差。凤姐心里想道：“这次老太太的事情没有东府里的人多。”又把庄上的弄出来几个，还是不够。正在思考，只见一个小丫头过来说：“鸳鸯姐姐请奶奶。”凤姐只得过去。只见鸳鸯哭得泪人一般，一把拉着凤姐，说道：“二奶奶请坐，我给二奶奶磕个头。虽然服丧期间不行礼，这个头是要磕的！”鸳鸯跪下，凤姐赶忙拉住，说道：“这是什么礼？有话好好说！”鸳鸯跪着，凤姐便把她拉起来。鸳鸯说道：“老太太的事情，内外一切，都由二爷和二奶奶来办理。这些银子是老太太留下的。老太太一辈子也没有浪费过什么银钱，如今临了这件大事，一定要请二奶奶好好地办一办才好！我刚才听到老爷说什么‘诗云子曰’，我不懂；又说什么‘丧与其易，宁戚’，我也不明白。我问宝二奶奶，老爷的意思是，老太太的葬礼只要悲痛才是真正的孝顺，不必花费太多，只为了好看。我觉得老太太这样一个人，怎么不应该体面一些呢？虽然我是奴才丫头，但敢说什么？只是老太太疼爱二奶奶和我，临死前为什么不让她风光一下呢？我想二奶奶是个能办大事的人，所以，我请二奶奶来，求个主意！我生是跟老太太的人，老太太死了，我也是跟老太太的！要是不办老太太的事怎么办，将来怎么见老太太呢？

paragraphs.original: 凤姐听了这话来的古怪，便说：“你放心，要体面是不难的。虽是老爷口说要省，那势派也错不得。便拿这项银子都花在老太太身上，也是该当的。”鸳鸯道：“老太太的遗言说，所有剩下的东西是给我们的，二奶奶倘或用著不够，只管拿这个去折变补上。就是老爷说什么，也不好违了老大太的遗言。况且老太太分派的时候，不是老爷在这里听见的么？”凤姐道：“你素来最明白的，怎么这会子这样的著急起来了？”鸳鸯道：“不是我著急，为的是大太太是不管事的，老爷是怕招摇的。若是二奶奶心里也是老爷的想头，说抄过家的人家，丧事还是这么好，将来又要抄起来，也就不顾起老太太来，怎么样呢？我呢，是个丫头，好歹碍不著，到底是这里的声名！”凤姐道：“我知道了。你只管放心，有我呢。”鸳鸯千恩万谢的托了凤姐。
paragraphs.english:
Feng Ji heard this and felt a little strange. She said, "Don't worry about it. You don't have to worry about the face. Even if the money is spent on the old lady, it's normal. If the old lady's will says that the remaining things are for us, then the money is not enough, and we can use it to make up for it. Even if the old lady's will is not heard by the old lady, it cannot be broken. After all, the old lady's will was heard by the old lady. " "You've always been the most clear-headed person, but why are you so nervous now?" "It's not me who's nervous, it's because my mother doesn't care about the matter, and my father is afraid to get into trouble. If the second lady has the same idea as my father, saying that the family that was confiscated should still be so dignified, then what will happen if it is confiscated in the future? paragraphs.original: 凤姐道：“银子发出来了没有？”贾琏道：“谁见过银子？我听见偺们太太听见了二老爷的话，极力的撺掇二太太和二老爷说：‘这是好主意！’叫我怎么著？现在外头棚杠上要支几百银子，这会子还没有发出来。我要去，他们都说有，先叫外头办了，回来再算。你想，这些奴才，有钱的早溜了。按著册子叫去，有说告病的，有说下庄子去了的。剩下几个走不动的，只有赚钱的能耐，还有赔钱的本事么？”凤姐听了，呆了半天，说道：“这还办什么！”
paragraphs.english: Xingfei asked, "Have the silver coins been released?" Jialing replied, "Who has seen the silver coins? I heard that our lady heard the second uncle's words and encouraged the second lady and her husband to say, 'This is a good idea!' What should I do? Now the tent on the pole needs to pay several hundred silver coins, but there is no money yet. I want to go, but they all say there is money, and they want to handle it first and then settle it later. Think about it, these slaves, the ones with money have already run away. They call them according to the register, and some say they are sick, some say they are going to the village. Only a few can't move, and they have the ability to make money, but also the ability to lose money?" Xingfei listened and was silent for a long time, saying, "What should we do then? We'll just give up."

paragraphs.original: 正说著，见来了一个丫头，说：“大太太的话，问二奶奶：今儿第三天了，里头还很乱，供了饭，还叫亲戚们等著吗？叫了半天，上了菜，短了饭：这是什么办事的道理？”凤姐急忙进去吆喝人来伺候，将就著把早饭打发了。偏偏那日人来的多，里头的人都死眉瞪眼的。凤姐只得在那里照料了一会子，又惦记著派人，赶著出来，叫了旺儿家的传齐了家下女人们，一一分派了。众人都答应著不动。凤姐道：“什么时候？还不供饭？”众人道：“传饭是容易的，只要将里头的东西发出来，我们才好照管去。”凤姐道：“糊涂东西！派定了你们，少不得有的。”众人只得勉强应著。

Xing Fu and others heard what Feng Jie said, not expecting her to be so stingy, so they said, "Feng Jie really doesn't care." paragraphs.original: 凤姐不敢再言，只得含悲忍泣的出来，又叫人传齐了众人，又吩咐了一会，说：“大娘婶子们可怜我罢！我上头捱了好些话，为的是你们不齐截，叫人笑话，明儿你们豁出些辛苦来罢！”那些人回道：“奶奶办事，不是今儿个一遭儿了，我们敢违拗吗？只是这回的事，上头过于累赘！只说打发这顿饭罢：有在这里吃的，有要在家里吃的；请了这位太太，又是那位奶奶不来。诸如此类，那里能齐全？还求奶奶劝劝那些姑娘们少挑饬就好了。”凤姐道：“头一层是老太太的丫头们是难缠的，太太们的也难说话，叫我说谁去呢？”众人道：“从前奶奶在东府里还是署事，要打要骂，怎么那样锋利？谁敢不依？如今这些姑娘们都压不住了？”凤姐叹道：“东府里的事，虽说托办的，太太虽在那里，不好意思说什么。如今是自己的事情，又是公中的，人人说得话。再者，外头的银钱也叫不灵：即如棚里要一件东西，传出去了，总不见拿进来，这叫我什么法儿呢？”众人道：“二爷在外头，倒怕不应付么？”凤姐道：“还提这个！他也是那里为难。第一件，银钱不在他手里，要一件得回一件，那里凑手？”众人道：“老太太这项银子不在二爷手里么？”凤姐道：“你们回来问管事的就知道了。”众人道：“怨不得！我们听见外头男人抱怨说：这么件大事，偺们一点摸不著，净当苦差，叫人怎么能齐心呢？”
paragraphs.english: Feng Ji dared not speak again, and had to go out with tears in her eyes. Then she gathered everyone together and repeated her words, saying, "Please be compassionate for me! I have received a lot of criticism from above because of your lack of unity, which has caused others to laugh at us. Tomorrow you will have to work hard." The people answered, "Grandmother, you have handled things this way before. We dare not disobey. But this time, the demands are too strict! It was only supposed to be a meal, but there are those who eat here and those who eat at home, and those who have been invited and those who have not. How can all these things be prepared? Please persuade the young ladies to not be so picky." Feng Ji said, "The first problem is the maids in the East Garden, who are hard to deal with, and the maids of the ladies are also difficult to speak to. What can I do?" The people said, "When you were in the East Garden, you were in charge. Even if the master was not there, you could still say something. But now these young ladies cannot be controlled." Feng Ji sighed, "Things in the East Garden were handled by meNow it's my own business, and it's public, everyone can have their say. In addition, money from the outside doesn't count: for example, if something is needed in the shed, it's sent out but never comes back, how can I deal with it? People say, "Why can't Mr. II handle it outside?" He's in a tough spot. First of all, he doesn't have the money, so he has to wait for it to be given to him, which is not convenient. People say, "Mr. II's money is with his grandmother, isn't it?" I say, "Ask the managers." People say, "No wonder! We hear that men outside are complaining about how they can't do their job properly because they're not in control. They're just doing hard work, and that's not fair."

paragraphs.original: 李纨道：“他的年纪其实也不小了。前日听见说，还要给他说亲呢，如今又得等著了。嗳！还有一件事：偺们家这些人，我看来也是说不清的！且不必说闲话儿，后日送殡，各房的车是怎么样？”众人道：“琏二奶奶这几天闹的像失魂落魄的样儿了，也没见传出去。昨儿听见外头男人们说：二爷派了蔷二爷料理，说是偺们家的车也不够，赶车的也少，要到亲戚家去借去呢。”李纨笑道：“车也都是借得的么？”众人道：“奶奶说笑话儿了，车怎么借不得？只是那一日所有的亲戚都用车，只怕难借，想来还得雇呢。”李纨道：“底下人的只得雇，上头白车也有雇的么？”众人道：“现在大太太，东府里的大奶奶小蓉奶奶都没有车了，不雇，那里来的呢？”李纨听了，叹息道：“先前见有偺们家里的太太奶奶们坐了雇的车来，偺们都笑话，如今轮到自己头上了！你明儿去告诉你们的男人：我们的车马，早早的预备好了，省了挤。”众人答应了出去。不提。

paragraphs.original: 且说史湘云因他女婿病著，贾母死后，只来了一次，屈指算是后日送殡，不能不去。又见他女婿的病已成痨症，暂且不妨，只得坐夜前一日过来。想起贾母素日疼他；又想到自己命苦，刚配了一个才貌双全的女婿，性情又好，偏偏的得了冤孽症候，不过捱日子罢了：于是更加悲痛，直哭了半夜。鸳鸯等再三劝慰不止。
paragraphs.english: Xiangyun, who had been married to a young man she loved dearly, came to see them only once after Jia Mother's death. She knew that her husband had developed tuberculosis, but that it was not yet severe, so she came the day before. She remembered how Jia Mother had always loved her and felt so sad for herself, for she had been married to a handsome and intelligent man, but was now sick and had to live out her days. She was very sad and cried all night. Only after many attempts to console her did she finally stop.
paragraphs.chinese: 史湘云因为女婿生病，贾母死后，只来了一次。她知道她女婿的病已经成了痨症，不过暂时没事，所以她在前一日过来。她想起了贾母以前总是疼爱她，又想到自己命苦，才嫁了一个英俊又聪明的女婿，但不幸得了病，只能捱日子。她非常悲伤，哭了一个晚上。鸳鸯等再三劝慰，她还是止不住。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉瞅著也不胜悲伤，又不好上前去劝。见他淡妆素服，不敷脂粉，更比未出嫁的时候犹胜几分。回头又看宝琴等也都是淡素妆饰，丰韵嫣然。独看到宝钗浑身挂孝，那一种雅致比寻常穿颜色时更自不同。心里想道：“古人说：千红万紫，终让梅花为魁。看来不止为梅花开的早，竟是那‘洁白清香’四字真不可及了。但只这时候若有林妹妹，也是这样打扮，更不知怎样的丰韵呢！”想到这里，不觉的心酸起来，那泪珠儿便一直的滚下来了，趁著贾母的事，不妨放声大哭。
